title: No, Capt Kundu Was Not Martyred the Day Priya Varrier Went Viral
subtitle: Days after Malayalam actor Priya Prakash Varrier went viral, another video on social media claimed that the day Varrier earned her fame, Captain Kapil Kundu was martyred on the frontier.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
However, the media did cover Kundu's death on 5 February, with the news earning prime coverage in newspapers across the country.

Kundu was set to celebrate his 23rd birthday just six days after he was killed in shelling by Pakistan in Jammu and Kashmir's Rajouri district.

According to NDTV, Kundu had already booked a ticket to travel back home to Patuadi, where he was to ring in his birthday with his sisters and mother on 10 February.
